name: Stantler

passive.name: Forest Mystic
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may search your deck for a Grass or Psychic Pokemon. Reveal the card to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Green Horn
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage and any Special Conditions from this Pokemon.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

flavor: These deer protect forests from overdevelopment. As human technology has progressed, they've become more and more rare.
